description: Attempting to access private/protected member via reflection or from unauthorized location.
commonCauses: Accessing package-private members from another package
solutions: Make fields/methods public or provide accessor methods
Avoid reflection when possible - use interfaces
Refactor to use public APIs instead of reflection
prevention: Design with proper encapsulation and public APIs
Use dependency injection instead of reflection
Use Android Lint to detect hidden API usage
examples: interface MyInterface { fun doWork() } // Better than reflection
// Instead of reflection: @Inject constructor(private val dep: Dependency)
-keep class com.example.** { *; } // ProGuard rule if reflection needed
